sen.j: 千宗室（せん そうしつ）は、茶道の流派の一つである裏千家の家元名。
sen.e: Soshitsu SEN is the name of the head of Ura-senke which is one of tea ceremony schools found in Japan.
Soshitsu SEN is the name of the head of Urasenke which is one of the tea schools.
Soshitsu SEN is the name of the head of Urasenke which is one of the tea schools.

sen.j: 裏千家4代家元である千宗室 (4代)より代々この名を襲名する。
sen.e: This name has been succeeded to one generation after another from Soshitsu SEN (the fourth) who was the fourth head of the school.
This name has been succeeded to one generation after another from Soshitsu SEN (the fourth) who was the fourth head of the school.
